title: Select sources & outputs
description: Get available audio, video sources and audio output devices from mediaDevices.enumerateDevices().
alert.warning: without permission, the browser will restrict the available devices to at most one pertype
select.audioInput.label: Audio input source:
select.audioOutput.label: Audio output destination:
select.videoSource.label: Video source
checkbox.audioOutputMuted.label: audio output muted
